# QLXD - NestJS Project

## Project Overview
This is a NestJS backend project built with TypeScript.

## Tech Stack
- NestJS
- TypeScript
- Node.js

## Development Guidelines
- Follow NestJS best practices
- Use dependency injection
- Create modules for each feature
- Use DTOs for data validation
